resources.string: This app has been created by (yayalose@gmail.com)

This application is free/libre software and is distributed under the AGPL v.3 license, except the code for implementing a backwards compatible action bar (authored by Google and distributed under the Apache v.2 license). The whole text of both licenses can be accessed below.

You are allowed to download and modify the source code of this app, as well as redistribute it with or without modifications under the same license. If you want to be part of the development, contact me :)
